hadith.chapter: The Book of Prayer (Travellers) - كتاب صلاة المسافرين وقصرها
hadith.arabic-text: حدثني محمد بن رافع، حدثنا شبابة، حدثني ورقاء، عن أبي الزناد، عن الأعرج، عن أبي هريرة، عن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم قال ‏"‏ من يقم ليلة القدر فيوافقها - أراه قال - إيمانا واحتسابا غفر له ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: 'A'isha reported that the Messenger of Allah (may peace be upon him) prayed one night in the mosque and people also prayed along with him. He then prayed on the following night and there were many persons. Then on the third or fourth night (many people) gathered there, but the Messenger of Allah (may peace be upon him) did not come out to them (for leading the Tarawih prayer). When it was morning he said: I saw what you were doing, but I desisted to come to you (and lead the prayer) for I feared that this prayer might become obligatory for you. (He the narrator) said: It was the month of Ramadan.
